name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: QA Hero - Create high quality bug reports

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create high quality bug reports while maintaining flow

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
QAHero lets you report visual bugs like never before. This easy to use extension let's you capture visual feedback accurately and quickly send it to your project management or bug reporting system.

Current Integrations include: JIRA, Trello and Github with more to come soon.

Our mission is to build the fastest tool to report bugs or enter feature requests.
